sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnclub ( CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , CLB_NM /* */ , CLB_INTRCN /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , REGIST_SE_CODE /* */ , TMPLAT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #clbId# /* */ , #cmmntyId# /* */ , #clbNm# /* */ , #clbIntrcn# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , #registSeCode# /* */ , #tmplatId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnclub SET CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ , CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */ , CLB_NM=#clbNm# /* */ , CLB_INTRCN=#clbIntrcn# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , REGIST_SE_CODE=#registSeCode# /* */ , TMPLAT_ID=#tmplatId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnclub WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , CLB_NM /* */ , CLB_INTRCN /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , REGIST_SE_CODE /* */ , TMPLAT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnclub WHERE CLB_ID=#clbId# /* */ AND CMMNTY_ID=#cmmntyId# /* */

SELECT CLB_ID /* */ , CMMNTY_ID /* */ , CLB_NM /* */ , CLB_INTRCN /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , REGIST_SE_CODE /* */ , TMPLAT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnclub WHERE 1=1
CLB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CMMNTY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CLB_ID DESC /* */ , CMMNTY_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnclub WHERE 1=1
CLB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CMMNTY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
